section.title: Web Services PMC
section.p: jUDDI is now being incubated within the Web Services PMC as part of the to the Apache Incubator. Part of this transition involves decommissioning the lists formely hosted on SourceForge.net including juddi-announce, juddi-users and juddi-developers.

section.title: jUDDI users
section.p: The juddi-user@ws.apache.org mailing list is the primary source of support for anyone using jUDDI. Use this list for posting questions (and answers) related to the installation, configuration and use of jUDDI.

section.title: jUDDI dev
section.p: The juddi-dev@ws.apache.org mailing list is for discussions about the jUDDI architecture, build process, testing and implementation details.

section.title: Archives
section.p: NOTE: Archives for the original jUDDI lists will continue to be available on SourceForge.net indefinitely. Click here to browse them.

The archives for the original SourceForge lists have been imported into MARC. Messages posted to the current Apache lists are also being archived at MARC. New messages posted the Apache lists are also being archived at Apache.

ul.li: SourceForge and Apache juddi-dev archive at http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=juddi-dev
SourceForge and Apache juddi-user archive at http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=juddi-user
